                                                                    ITSSQuick Start GuidesCurrent page:  Technology Quick Start Guide for Students
                        
    		Technology Quick Start Guide for Students
    	Getting OnlineGetting connected to Eduroam on campusGetting online off-campusKeep LearningEssential resources for learning in a virtual environment.Account & Password ManagementMost campus systems are accessed with your Wildcat Account, which can be managed with  Account Center. Chico State PortalThe Chico State Portal provides a central location for many of the resources students need. These include WildcatMail, Blackboard, LinkedIn Learning, Student Center, Wildcat Sync, Handshake, Wildcat Store, Chico State Alerts, and more.IT Support PortalThe IT Support Portal contains the  IT Service Catalog where you can request services and technical support, and the  IT Knowledge Base.WildcatMailYour campus email account(opens in new window) is now provided by Microsoft 365. The other Google Apps for Education(opens in new window) remain available, including Drive, Docs, Sheets, Slides, Calendar, and more.Learning Management SystemThe campus is transitioning from Blackboard Learn to Canvas. During the transition, some students may have courses in one or both platforms.IT SecurityStudents are often targeted by scams, phishing, computer viruses, and ransomware.Technology and Equity InclusionTEIN provides support for inclusive technology, and assists with setting up technology accommodations.SoftwareStudents can get technical support or get access to many applications(opens in new window). Software is available on lab computers, virtual labs, or for installation on personal devices depending on the application. Some commonly used applications available to students for installation on personal devices:Adobe Creative Cloud(opens in new window)Microsoft Office(opens in new window)Microsoft Project(opens in new window)LinkedIn LearningLinkedIn Learning offers expert video tutorials on a wide variety of topics. Students have unlimited access to all of these videos.Information TechnologyKendall Hall, 109www.csuchico.edu/itSupport Our CollegeMore in our divisionComputing & Communication ServicesCreative Media & TechnologyEnterprise ApplicationsInformation SecurityInstitutional Research and Strategic Analytics (IRSA)IT Administrative ServiceIT Support ServicesTechnology Equity and Inclusion
We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus. We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.Contact UsNeed Help?FacebookFacebookTwitterTwitterInstagramInstagramReport an accessibility issueReport a broken link on this pageTitle IXPrivacy PolicyCalifornia State University, Chico400 West First StreetChico, CA 95929Copyright © 2023 All Rights Reserved
